text: Super stoked to see Custom Behavioral Objects in beta. That’s been high on my personal wishlist for years, so thank you! :pray: Not sure if the PM who’s working on that hangs out here, but if so, I’d love to get some insight on where it’s at and where it’s going. I’m actively working on a project this week that I can test with and provide feedback.

Hi all, We are setting up HubSpot Tracking for the first time. Typically with Google Analytics we have a tag for each server (dev/stg/qa/prod). I am not seeing how this is done in HubSpot without multiple accounts. Does anyone have a best practice here? Thanks for the time!
<@UMCBG6QK0> <@U2H3TT8F2> what’s a use case for behavioral objects? I’m just barely getting my head around regular custom objects.
Think analytical events with properties, like you might send along to tools like Amplitude or Mixpanel
Is there a beta or is everyone getting acces?
